    <footnotes>
        <footnote id="F1">The reporting person disclaims beneficial ownership of these securities, and this report shall not be deemed an admission that the reporting person is the beneficial owner of such securities for purposes of Section 16 or for any other purpose.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F2">Each restricted stock unit represents a contingent right to receive one share of Microsoft common stock.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F3">Dividend equivalent rights accrue when and as dividends are paid on the Company's common stock and become exercisable proportionately with the  restricted stock units to which they relate.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F4">The restricted stock units are fully vested. Delivery of the shares to the reporting person will be made in 5 equal annual installments commencing 30 days after the date of the reporting person's separation from service to the Board of Directors.</footnote>
    </footnotes>
